DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars 12 in 1 Sewing Multi Tool
DescriptionData.Description:
A wonderfully useful sewing gadget, this has 12 tools conveniently located in one handy case.
This has for your sewing delight: 1. Tape Measure 2. Stuffing Tool 3. Piercing Punch 4. Knit Picker 5. Seam Ripper 6. Thread Cutter 7. Magnet 8. Safety Pin 9. Punch Needle 10. Magnifying Glass 11. Needle Threader 12. Tweezers
It is the Swiss Army Knife for Sewing tools, a perfect addition for your sewing box or an ideal gift for any fn of sewing.

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Softtouch Micro-Tip Scissors 16cm
DescriptionData.Description: Spring action scissors from Fiskars with Softtouch cushioned handles, making cutting easy and comfortable. The blade tension can be adjusted to suit your needs and there is a side lock for safe storage. The tip has been designed to make it as easy as possible for you to see what you are working on and to bring you the highest cutting accuracy possible.

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Razor Edge Fabric Scissors 13cm
DescriptionData.Description: Right handed ultra sharp scissors from Fiskars with 13cm long stainless steel blades which have an edge that has been precisely honed. Perfect for detail cutting and can cut through thicker materials with ease. They have an extremely comfortable grip with ergonomic handles. Supplied with a protective sheath to help keep them in perfect condition.

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Razor Edge Fabric Scissors 21cm
DescriptionData.Description: Right handed ultra sharp scissors from Fiskars with 21cm long stainless steel blades which have an edge that has been precisely honed. Perfect for detail cutting and can cut through thicker materials with ease. They have an extremely comfortable grip with ergonomic handles. Supplied with a protective sheath to help keep them in perfect condition.
